name: FaqSplitMedia
description: FAQ section with split layout featuring media (image/video) on one side and accordion list on the other.

description.example: Find answers to common questions about our products and services

faqs.example: [{"id": "1", "title": "What is your return policy?", "content": "We offer a 30-day money-back guarantee."}]
faqs.note: Array of FAQ items. Each item requires unique id, title (question), and content (answer with HTML support).

animationType.note: Animation type for accordion open/close. 'smooth' uses height transition, 'instant' shows/hides immediately.

mediaPosition.note: Position of media relative to FAQ list.

imageSrc.note: Path to image file. Either imageSrc or videoSrc should be provided.

videoSrc.note: Path to video file. Either imageSrc or videoSrc should be provided.

propsSchema.faqs: Array<{ id: string, title: string, content: string }> - FAQ items
propsSchema.title: string
propsSchema.titleSegments?: Array<{ type: 'text', content: string } | { type: 'image', src: string, alt?: string }> - For inline images in title
propsSchema.buttons?: Array<{text: string, onClick?: () => void, href?: string}>
propsSchema.textboxLayout: 'default' | 'split' | 'split-actions' | 'split-description' | 'inline-image' (required - 'inline-image' uses titleSegments for rich text with images)

usageExample: <FaqSplitMedia faqs={[{id: '1', title: 'What is your return policy?', content: 'We offer a 30-day money-back guarantee on all our products.'}, {id: '2', title: 'How long does shipping take?', content: 'Standard shipping typically takes 5-7 business days.'}]} imageSrc="/images/faq-hero.jpg" imageAlt="Customer support representative" title="Frequently Asked Questions" description="Find answers to common questions" textboxLayout="default" useInvertedBackground={"noInvert"} mediaPosition="left" />
dont: Do not use more than 4 items
